original_solution_mapping.L1: A total of 10*2=<<10*2=20>>20 students went on the field trip.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Some chaperones showed up, letting the group grow to 20+5=<<20+5=25>>25 individuals.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The teachers had to come as well, making the group as big as 25+2=<<25+2=27>>27 individuals.
original_solution_mapping.L4: When the school day ended, 27-10=<<27-10=17>>17 individuals were left.
original_solution_mapping.L5: A couple of chaperones followed suit, leaving 17-2=<<17-2=15>>15 people at the zoo.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7328.
    Returns: the number of individuals left at the zoo.
    """
    # L1
    class_students = 10 # class of 10 students
    num_classes = 2 # merged with another class with the same amount of students
    total_students = class_students * num_classes

    # L2
    num_parents_chaperone = 5 # 5 parents offered to be a chaperone
    total_with_parents = total_students + num_parents_chaperone

    # L3
    num_teachers = 2 # 2 of the teachers from both classes will be there too
    total_with_teachers = total_with_parents + num_teachers

    # L4
    students_left = 10 # 10 of them left
    after_students_left = total_with_teachers - students_left

    # L5
    chaperones_left = 2 # Two of the chaperones were parents in that group, so they left as well
    individuals_left_at_zoo = after_students_left - chaperones_left

    # FA
    answer = individuals_left_at_zoo
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: A total of {class_students}*{num_classes}=<<{class_students}*{num_classes}={total_students}>>{total_students} students went on the field trip.
Some chaperones showed up, letting the group grow to {total_students}+{num_parents_chaperone}=<<{total_students}+{num_parents_chaperone}={total_with_parents}>>{total_with_parents} individuals.
The teachers had to come as well, making the group as big as {total_with_parents}+{num_teachers}=<<{total_with_parents}+{num_teachers}={total_with_teachers}>>{total_with_teachers} individuals.
When the school day ended, {total_with_teachers}-{students_left}=<<{total_with_teachers}-{students_left}={after_students_left}>>{after_students_left} individuals were left.
A couple of chaperones followed suit, leaving {after_students_left}-{chaperones_left}=<<{after_students_left}-{chaperones_left}={individuals_left_at_zoo}>>{individuals_left_at_zoo} people at the zoo.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '+' instead.
